AppRobot - Class in itt.t00154755.mouseserver
This is the class that controls the mapping of the accelerometer readings to the cursor on the screen.

AppServerGUI - Class in itt.t00154755.mouseserver
Built using the Swing Design Eclipse Plug-in AppServerGUI allows the user to interact with the server, also give a visual output as to whether the server is running or not.
